Package com.github.upthewaterspout.fates.core.threading.instrument.asm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractClassVisitor
    Base class for synchronization hook adding visitors with common functionality.
    AsmTransformer
    Pipeline of ASM ClassVisitors that transforms classes, adding the appropriate hooks to control thread ordering
    IncreaseMaxStack
    A ClassVisitor that adjusts the maximum stack size up by 5 for all methods.
    InstrumentFieldAccess
    Adds calls to ExecutionEventSingleton.beforeSetField(Object, Object, String, String, String, int) and ExecutionEventSingleton.beforeGetField(Object, String, String, String, int) before all field access.
    InstrumentJoin
    Replaces all calls to Thread.join() with calls to ExecutionEventSingleton.replaceJoin(Thread)
    InstrumentLockSupport
    Replace calls to LockSupport with calls to ExecutionEventSingleton TODO - implement this using ReplaceMethodCall
    InstrumentMethodCalls
    Replaces all calls to Thread.join() with calls to ExecutionEventSingleton.replaceJoin(Thread)
    InstrumentNewObject
    Instrument calls to create an object.
    InstrumentNewObject.InstrumentNew  
    InstrumentSynchronizedBlock
    Adds calls to ExecutionEventSingleton.beforeSynchronization(Object) and ExecutionEventSingleton.afterSynchronization(Object) for synchronized blocks.
    InstrumentSynchronizedMethod
    Converts synchronized methods into unsychronized methods with nested synchronized blocks.
    InstrumentThreadExit
    Adds a call to ExecutionEventSingleton.beforeThreadExit() when a thread is exiting.
    InstrumentThreadSynchronizedMethods
    Thread has some synchronized methods that must include before/after synchronization calls.
    InstrumentWaitNotify
    Replaces Object.wait() and Object.notify() with calls to Object.wait() and Object.notify()
    MinimumVersionVisitor
    A visitor that sets the minimum java version of the generated class file to V1_5.
    ReplaceMethodCall
    ClassVisitor that will replace calls from one method to calls to another method.
    ReplaceMethodCall.MethodCall  
    SingletonCall
    Utility for adding calls to ExecutionEventSingleton
